thread.title: BRIEF-Ballard Power Systems Signed Technology Solutions Program To Develop Air-Cooled Fuel Cell Stack​

title: BRIEF-Ballard Power Systems Signed Technology Solutions Program To Develop Air-Cooled Fuel Cell Stack​

organizations.name: brief-ballard power systems signed technology s
brief-ballard power systems signed technology solutions program
develop air-cooled fuel cell stack​ reuters staff

text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Ballard Power Systems Inc:
* BALLARD POWER SYSTEMS INC - ‍ SIGNED A TECHNOLOGY SOLUTIONS PROGRAM WITH AN UNNAMED CUSTOMER TO DEVELOP A AIR-COOLED FUEL CELL STACK​
* BALLARD POWER SYSTEMS INC - ‍MULTI-YEAR PROGRAM HAS AN INITIAL VALUE TO BALLARD OF APPROXIMATELY $4.2 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
